result.eng: The king's only son was killed.
result.ga: Maraíodh aonmhac an rí
result.orig: Maraíodh aonmhac an rí
result.html: Maraíodh aonmhac an ríThe king's only son was killed.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ aonṁac an ríThe king's only son was killed.

result.eng: Glory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.
result.ga: Glóir do Dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa Críost
result.orig: Glóir do Dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa Críost
result.html: Glóir do Dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa CríostGlory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.
result.ponchtml: Glóir do Ḋia is dá aonṁac Íosa CríostGlory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.

result.eng: His son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ga: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.orig: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.html: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ṁac imiṫe uaiḋ agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.

result.eng: I have two sons.
result.ga: Tá beirt mhac agam
result.orig: Tá beirt mhac agam
result.html: Tá beirt mhac agamI have two sons.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṁac agamI have two sons.

result.eng: The number of university students is growing.
result.ga: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid
result.orig: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid
result.html: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méidThe number of university students is growing.

result.eng: My name is Bob Mac Mathúna.
result.ga: Bob Mac Mathúna is ainm dom
result.orig: Bob Mac Mathúna is ainm dom
result.html: Bob Mac Mathúna is ainm domMy name is Bob Mac Mathúna.
result.ponchtml: Bob Mac Maṫúna is ainm domMy name is Bob Mac Mathúna.

result.eng: We have two sons and a daughter.
result.ga: Tá beirt mhac agus iníon againn
result.orig: Tá beirt mhac agus iníon againn
result.html: Tá beirt mhac agus iníon againnWe have two sons and a daughter.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṁac agus iníon againnWe have two sons and a daughter.

result.eng: His sons.
result.ga: A chlann mhac
result.orig: A chlann mhac
result.html: A chlann mhacHis sons.

result.eng: This is my son Seán.
result.ga: Seo é mo mhac Seán

result.html: Seo é mo mhac SeánThis is my son Seán.
result.ponchtml: Seo é mo ṁac SeánThis is my son Seán.

result.eng: What is Thomas' son's name?

result.eng: Is that your son?

result.orig: An é sin do mhac
result.html: An é sin do mhacIs that your son?

result.eng: This is my son Dara.

result.html: Is é seo mo mhac DaraThis is my son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Is é seo mo ṁac DaraThis is my son Dara.

result.eng: I saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.orig: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara

result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do ṁac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.

result.eng: Oh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ga: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.orig: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.html: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadhOh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ponchtml: Ó feicim go ḃfuil mo ṁac ag caoineaḋOh, I see that my son is crying.

result.eng: Membership for students is two euros, and it is free for young children.
result.ga: Tá dhá euro ar bhallraíocht do mhic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do pháistí óga

result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá euro ar ḃallraíoċt do ṁic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do ṗáistí ógaMembership for students is two euros, and it is free for young children.

result.eng: My brother's son has a sailing boat.

result.eng: Do you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.

result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníonDo you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.

result.eng: I have one son, Stiofán, he's five years old.

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin

result.ponchtml: Lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí Mohammad Atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas Ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ĠearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
